com.mrudultora.colorpicker

Class ColorPickerPopUp

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • com.mrudultora.colorpicker.ColorPickerPopUp
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.View.OnTouchListener, android.view.ViewTreeObserver.OnGlobalLayoutListener

    public class ColorPickerPopUp
extends android.view.View
implements android.view.ViewTreeObserver.OnGlobalLayoutListener, android.view.View.OnTouchListener
    A ColorPicker pop up to choose any color with or without alpha. Uses ColorPickerView inside. Supports both portrait and landscape orientation.
    Since:
    6 May, 2021

      • show

        public void show()
        Shows the dialog box using AlertDialog.Builder using layout_colorpicker_popup.xml.

      • onTouch

        public boolean onTouch(android.view.View view,
                       android.view.MotionEvent motionEvent)
        For handling touch events on colorPickerView, hueImageView, alphaImageView. Sets the hue, saturation, and value on the basis of current coordinates and the size of respective views.
        Specified by:
        onTouch in interface android.view.View.OnTouchListener
        Parameters:
        view - (view on which touch event happened)
        motionEvent - (type of motion event)
        Returns:
        boolean

      • onGlobalLayout

        public void onGlobalLayout()
        This method will be called on very first time the dialog would be showed. Used to set the positions of cursors/pointers for first time the dialog pops up.
        Specified by:
        onGlobalLayout in interface android.view.ViewTreeObserver.OnGlobalLayoutListener

      • setDefaultColor

        public ColorPickerPopUp setDefaultColor(int defaultColor)
        Sets the default color in ColorPickerView, Hue and Alpha (if enabled). Default color if not set is Color.HSVToColor(new float[]{1f, 1f, 1f}).
        Parameters:
        defaultColor - (int format)
        Returns:
        this

      • setOnPickColorListener

        public ColorPickerPopUp setOnPickColorListener(ColorPickerPopUp.OnPickColorListener onPickColorListener)
        On using OnPickColorListener to select the picked color. It would be fired on pressing either of the buttons (positive or negative).
        Parameters:
        onPickColorListener - (onPickColorListener)
        Returns:
        this

      • setShowAlpha

        public ColorPickerPopUp setShowAlpha(boolean showAlpha)
        Sets whether to show Alpha Channel or not. Default value is true.
        Parameters:
        showAlpha - (to show alpha or not)
        Returns:
        this
